trans-unit.source: Resolute Archangel
trans-unit.target: Resolute Archangel

trans-unit.source: Flying When Resolute Archangel enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than your starting life total, it becomes equal to your starting life total.
trans-unit.target: Flying When Resolute Archangel enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than your starting life total, it becomes equal to your starting life total.

trans-unit.source: Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.
trans-unit.target: Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.

trans-unit.source: Chasm Skulker
trans-unit.target: Chasm Skulker

trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Chasm Skulker. When Chasm Skulker dies, create X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Chasm Skulker. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Chasm Skulker. When Chasm Skulker dies, create X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Chasm Skulker. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

trans-unit.source: Chief Engineer
trans-unit.target: Chief Engineer

trans-unit.source: Artifact spells you cast have convoke. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting an artifact spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: Artifact spells you cast have convoke. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting an artifact spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

trans-unit.source: An eye for detail, a mind for numbers, a soul of clockwork.
trans-unit.target: An eye for detail, a mind for numbers, a soul of clockwork.

trans-unit.source: Mercurial Pretender
trans-unit.target: Mercurial Pretender

trans-unit.source: You may have Mercurial Pretender enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control, except it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand."
trans-unit.target: You may have Mercurial Pretender enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control, except it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand."

trans-unit.source: The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.
trans-unit.target: The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.

trans-unit.source: Indulgent Tormentor
trans-unit.target: Indulgent Tormentor

trans-unit.source: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

trans-unit.source: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.
trans-unit.target: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

trans-unit.source: Goblin Rabblemaster
trans-unit.target: Goblin Rabblemaster

trans-unit.source: Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.
trans-unit.target: Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

trans-unit.source: Siege Dragon
trans-unit.target: Siege Dragon

trans-unit.source: Flying When Siege Dragon enters the battlefield, destroy all Walls your opponents control. Whenever Siege Dragon attacks, if defending player controls no Walls, it deals 2 damage to each creature without flying that player controls.
trans-unit.target: Flying When Siege Dragon enters the battlefield, destroy all Walls your opponents control. Whenever Siege Dragon attacks, if defending player controls no Walls, it deals 2 damage to each creature without flying that player controls.

trans-unit.source: Phytotitan
trans-unit.target: Phytotitan

trans-unit.target: When Phytotitan dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of their next upkeep.

trans-unit.source: Its root system spans the entire floor of the jungle, making eradication impossible.
